articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Cursor launches a web app to manage AI coding agents - TechCrunch
articles.description: Cursor is launching a web app thats allow users to manage a network of AI coding agents via browser, on desktop and mobile.
articles.content:
The company behind Cursor, the viral AI coding editor, launched a web app on Monday that allows users to manage a network of coding agents directly from their browser.
The launch marks Cursor’s next… [+2893 chars]

articles.title: The second launch of New Glenn will aim for Mars - Ars Technica
articles.description: The payload likely to spark the most interest is the Blue Moon MK1 lander.

articles.title: Canada abruptly scraps digital services tax targeting US technology firms days after Trump ripped ‘foolish’ move - New York Post
articles.description: Canada scrapped its digital services tax targeting U.S. technology firms late on Sunday.
articles.content: Canada has abruptly scrapped its plan to enforce a new digital service tax on American tech firms days after President Trump blasted the foolish move as a direct and blatant attack on the United Stat… [+3117 chars]
